item.description:

player.getInventory().addItem(20772, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(20769, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(20770, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(10034, 1111); player.getInventory().deleteItem(2995, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(4067, 1000); player.getInventory().deleteItem(18344, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(18839, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(15492, 1); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You receive the cape and hood."); player.getInventory().addItem(20770, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(20767, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(20768, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(995, 5000000); player.getInventory().deleteItem(19709, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(1514, 100); player.getInventory().deleteItem(452, 100); player.getInventory().deleteItem(384, 100); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You receive the cape and hood."); } else player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You do not have the required items."); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You need these items to get this cape."); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Max cape and hood"); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Dungeoneering master cape"); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("500 magic logs"); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("500 raw sharks"); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("500 runite ore");
